abstract: Bank of America is distancing itself from its venture capital arm, BA Venture Partners, to concentrate on its middle-market private equity unit, BA Capital Investors. BA Ventures said Wednesday that it would rename itself Scale Venture Partners as Bank of America repositions itself as a minority investor.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is distancing itself from its venture capital arm, BA Venture Partners, to concentrate on its middle-market private equity unit, BA Capital Investors. BA Ventures said Wednesday that it would rename itself Scale Venture Partners as Bank of America repositions itself as a minority investor.

headline.main: Bank of America Steps Back from Venture Arm
